context: Large retail chain experiencing inventory stockouts and excess inventory issues, impacting sales and customer satisfaction

request.purpose: Implement AI-driven supply chain optimization platform and inventory management system
request.justification: Reduce stockouts by 40% and excess inventory by 25% to improve profitability

decision_process.outcome: Identified key pain points and technology gaps
Selected AI platform with proven retail implementations

business_impact.expected_outcome: Improved inventory turnover and reduced carrying costs

lessons_learned: Early stakeholder involvement critical for successful technology adoption
